channel.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
channel.description: Well, the title pretty much sums it up. I have just added Dragon Claws, and I would like to figure out how to fix the weapon:!! NOT EXISTING ITEM !!! -ID It only says that when I have it equipped

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

W000t fixed it, thanks everyone for the help!

Read full topic

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @fallen543 fallen543
item.description:
@fallen543 wrote:

When you dont add no errors?

Weird.

Copy one of the items in Item.cfg thats already made.

Change the item id and the name, And try that, then go back and edit the bonus’s and price’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

When I add it to item.cfg I get this error in run.bat

Made by SiCKO. Add xboxmodder16@hotmail.com on msn
if you have any questions / comments / concerns.
Please make sure your runserver file is named run.bat
How often would you like to restart? (In Minutes) 30
DeltaScape Server.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16
        at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283)
        at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173)
        at server.main(server.java:112)

Read full topic

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @fallen543 fallen543
item.description:
@fallen543 wrote:

[quote=“fallen543, post:9, topic:321769”]Open Item.cfg At the top or buttom or anywhere, Put this.

item = ItemID Dragon_claws Most_deadliest_weapon_to_be_released. 5000 500 15000 70 70 70 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 66 7

5000 -> Sell price
500 -> Buy Price
15000 -> Alch Price

The rest of the numbers are the stats.[/quote]

Just do that -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:5, topic:321769”][quote author=John459 link=topic=418196.msg3073998#msg3073998 date=1261690261]
No, you have to add the into into your Item.cfg
[/quote]

If you do what I posted it’ll still say Dragon Claws.

sendWeapon() method

if (playerEquipment[3] == IDOFCLAWS) { setSideBarInterface(0, 7762); sendFrame246(7763, 200, weapon); sendFrame126("Dragon Claws", 7764); }

Do I find this in client.java?

You add it in the sendWeapon method.[/quote]
I can’t find it

Read full topic

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Make sure you use tabs, and not spaces. Also make sure it has the same amount of variables as all the other items.

Read full topic

item.title: Fix weapon:! NOT EXISTING ITEM ! -ID
item.dc:creator: @fallen543 fallen543
item.description:
@fallen543 wrote:

Open Item.cfg At the top or buttom or anywhere, Put this.

item = ItemID Dragon_claws Most_deadliest_weapon_to_be_released. 5000 500 15000 70 70 70 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 66 7

5000 -> Sell price
500 -> Buy Price
15000 -> Alch Price

The rest of the numbers are the stats.

Read full topic
